ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), NOT($Permission.Sales_Admin), OR( B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 0.01, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 0.03, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 0.07, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 0.09, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 0.11, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 0.13, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c >= 0.23 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Percentage invalid, it cannot be 1%, 3%, 7%, 9%, 11%, 13% equal or above 23%
